msbt.message: A shootin' star! Tonight's sky sure is somethin'!
I heard that shooting stars are just space junk burnin' up high above us.Mighty pretty for a trash fire
, a shooting star! Aw, went by too quick to wish on.
Well, how about that. A rainbow!I know what you're probably thinkin', but take it from me, no pot of gold's worth dealin' with filthy leprechauns.
Lookie thereâ€”a rainbow! Maybe it'll turn my luck around.
One time I followed a rainbow all the way to the end and caught me a leprechaun. Ornery li'l fella
Wow! Ain't every day you get to see a double rainbow like that.
Are you seein' this double rainbow, or do I need to get myself looked at?
Well, boy howdy, there's twice as many rainbows up there now! Wait, what's twice nothin? Is it two?
Looks like someone's wavin' a big curtain of light all across the skyJust like the time I set my curtains on fire while cookin' some beans. Could go for some beans right now
Quite a sight, ain't it? Just takes my breath away. But I kinda need my breath
That light show in the sky was well worth stayin' up late to see! Though I can't sleep most nights
Can't say I'm a fan of all them trails planes leave behind. They kinda clutter up the sky, ruinin' the view.
Some plane left a trail of cloud all across the sky! Remember when planes wrote stuff with clouds? Maybe that was supposed to be a message for us, but the pilot couldn't think of anythin' to say!
Sure wish them planes would stop scribblin' all over our sky
Everyone's always sayin', "The moon sure looks pretty tonight," but it looks pretty every night, don't it?Not like I think the moon's ugly or anythin', , I'm just sayin' it's gotta have off nights.
We're always lookin' at the front side of the moon. None of us has ever seen the back of the thing. Can't say I blame it for wantin' to hide its backside. It's a good policy.
They say the moon reflects the sun, but y'ever hear of anyone stayin' out too late and gettin' a moonburn?
